  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_103127</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_103127</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Traçage de rayon des angles de réflexion</string>
            <string language="en">Ray tracing of reflection angles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Strahlverfolgung der Reflexion Winkel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Traçado do raio de ângulos da reflexão</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tracciato del raggio degli angoli di riflessione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επισήμανση του Ray των γωνιών αντανάκλασης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Trazo del rayo de los ángulos de la reflexión</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre des rayons de lumière d'incidence légers frappant un miroir sous différents angles. Ceci peut  être utilisé comme exercice où il faudrait retracer la trajectoire du rayon.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows incident light rays striking a mirror at different angles. This can be used as a ray tracing exercise.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">l'angle d'incidence</string>
            <string language="en">incidence angle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">lumière</string>
            <string language="en">Light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">miroir</string>
            <string language="en">mirror</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">traçage de rayon</string>
            <string language="en">ray tracing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">rayons</string>
            <string language="en">rays</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">angle reflété</string>
            <string language="en">reflected angle</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt Ereignis die hellen 
Strahlen, die einen Spiegel in den unterschiedlichen Winkeln 
anschlagen. Dieses kann als verfolgenübung des Strahls 
verwendet werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a incident os raios 
claros que golpeiam um espelho em ângulos diferentes. Isto pode
ser usado como um exercício seguindo do raio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra ad avvenimento i 
raggi luminosi che colpiscono uno specchio agli angoli differenti. 
Ciò può essere usata come esercitazione seguente del raggio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει συναφείς ελαφριές 
ακτίνες που χτυπούν έναν καθρέφτη στις διαφορετικές γωνίες. 
Αυτό μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί ως άσκηση επισήμανσης 
ακτίνων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra a incidente los rayos 
ligeros pulso un espejo a diversos ángulos. Esto se puede 
utilizar como ejercicio que rastrea del rayo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ausdehnung Winkel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiegel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Strahlverfolgung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Strahlen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">reflektierter Winkel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ângulo da incidência</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Luz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">espelho</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">traçado do raio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">raios</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ângulo refletido</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Luce</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">specchio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">tracciato del raggio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">raggi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">angolo riflesso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γωνία επίπτωσης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φως</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">καθρέφτης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">επισήμανση ακτίνων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ακτίνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">απεικονισμένη γωνία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">espejo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">trazo del rayo</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
